availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph P. Armacost (Pendleton and Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Pendleton and Bracken County, Kentucky, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Lucinda Maria Demoss Armacost in Bracken County on December 4, 1854. Father of Mary Armacost, Joseph C. Armacost, and Elizabeth Armacost. Farmer in Pendleton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, p. 651.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Pendleton County, Foster Precinct, p. 358B.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bracken County Marriages, Film #000851644.
